message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 400k, you can't refuse!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't get too greedy!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'll give you a slightly worse deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy... again!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll give you a slightly worse deal again!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy... again... again!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll give you a slightly worse deal again, but I'm getting desperate!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting desperate yet!
I'm running out of options, but I'll give you a slightly worse deal again!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
